item.title: ngrok - 一个免费内网穿透api工具
item.description: ngrok - 一个免费内网穿透api工具 # 官网: https://dashboard.ngrok.com/get-started/setup/linux 步骤说明 # 一共三步, 安装、配置、发布就是这么简单: curl -s https://ngrok-agent.s3.amazonaws.com/ngrok.asc \ | sudo tee /etc/apt/trusted.gpg.d/ngrok.asc >/dev/null \ && echo "deb https://ngrok-agent.s3.amazonaws.com buster main" \ | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/ngrok.list \ && sudo apt update \ && sudo apt install ngrok ngrok config add-authtoken {authtoken} > Authtoken saved to configuration file: {home}/.config/ngrok/ngrok.yml # 发布应用 ngrok http http://localhost:8080 成功输出: # ngrok (Ctrl+C to quit) Try our new Traffic Inspector: https://ngrok.
